summary: For those of you who wanted the enchantents and the weapon
descriptionHtml:
Craftable and Upgradable rare weapons from dragonborn.

For those of you who wanted the enchantents and the weapon

Includes:
-Dwarven Black Bow of Fate
-Dwarven Black Bow 
-Champion\'s Cudgel
-Glass Bow of The Stag Prince

The standard Dwarven black bow is enchantable :)


My other Mods-
Miraaks Armour Sword and Staff Craftable-Non Enchanted-Upgradable-Enchantable
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31258

Dragonborn Three Craftable-Upgradable Dragon Priest Masks
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31483
author: Rudeeyy
